name: Magnets (itch) (bltnico)
description:
Hi, I'm a french developer and this is my first game ever! I challenged myself to create my first game in one day.

Magnets is an arcade puzzle game. Collide yellow block (you) into green block with a synthwave music! All reset, death and direction are counted in a final score. Press L on main screen to select levels and change difficulty with UP and DOWN arrows (3 difficulty available currently).

Try to get the best score or speedrun all levels under 3 minutes!
